text: Elizabeth Jean Andrew-Oates (28 February 1948 â€“ 12 April 1993) was an Australian politician. She was a member of the Country Liberal Party. She served as the member for Sanderson in the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly from 1974 to 1977. Andrew was born in Border Town, South Australia. She was married twice and had two children. In 1989, she was diagnosed with cancer. She died on 12 April 1993 in Adelaide, South Australia, at the age of 45. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Politicians from South Australia Category:Members of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly
title: Liz Andrew
